name: Modern Charcoal Sectional Sofa
description: Spacious L-shaped sectional sofa with clean lines and plush cushioning, perfect for contemporary living spaces. Features durable charcoal fabric upholstery and solid hardwood frame with reversible chaise lounge.

name: Vintage Leather Armchair
description: Classic vintage-style armchair crafted from genuine top-grain leather with brass nail head trim. Features rich brown patina that develops character over time, perfect for studies or reading nooks.

name: Round Oak Dining Table
description: Solid oak dining table with beautiful natural grain finish and pedestal base. Perfect for intimate dining experiences, seats up to 4 people comfortably with timeless farmhouse appeal.

name: Ceramic Base Table Lamp
description: Elegant ceramic table lamp with glazed white finish and natural linen shade. Provides warm ambient lighting perfect for bedside tables or living room accent lighting.

name: Persian Blue Area Rug
description: Traditional Persian-style area rug in rich navy blue with intricate gold and cream patterns. Machine-woven for durability while maintaining classic elegance and timeless appeal.

name: Gold Framed Wall Mirror
description: Decorative wall mirror with ornate gold frame featuring baroque-inspired details. Perfect statement piece for entryways, bedrooms, or powder rooms with classical elegance.

name: King Platform Bed
description: Minimalist king-size platform bed with built-in nightstands and LED accent lighting. Clean lines and dark walnut finish complement modern bedroom aesthetics perfectly.

name: White Ladder Bookcase
description: Five-shelf ladder-style bookcase in crisp white finish with clean Scandinavian design. Perfect for displaying books, plants, and decorative objects in any room.

name: Oak China Hutch
description: Traditional oak china hutch with glass-front upper cabinet and spacious lower storage. Perfect for displaying fine china and storing dining essentials with classic farmhouse charm.

name: Linen Blackout Curtains
description: Set of two linen-textured blackout curtains in soft gray. Energy-efficient design blocks 99% of light while providing elegant window treatment for better sleep.

name: Emerald Velvet Loveseat
description: Luxurious loveseat upholstered in rich emerald velvet with gold-finished legs. Perfect accent piece that adds glamour and sophisticated color to any living space.

name: Glass Top Coffee Table
description: Modern coffee table with tempered glass top and chrome legs. Clean, minimalist design creates an open feel while providing functional surface space.

name: Tufted Accent Chair
description: Classic button-tufted accent chair in soft beige fabric with dark wood legs. Timeless design complements both traditional and contemporary decor schemes beautifully.

name: Arc Floor Lamp
description: Contemporary arc floor lamp with adjustable head and marble base. Perfect for reading or creating ambient lighting over seating areas with mid-century modern appeal.

name: Six-Drawer Dresser
description: Classic white six-drawer dresser with brushed nickel hardware. Ample storage space with smooth-gliding drawers and anti-tip safety features for bedroom organization.

name: Abstract Canvas Art
description: Large abstract canvas artwork featuring bold brushstrokes in blues and golds. Gallery-wrapped and ready to hang, perfect for adding modern artistic flair to any room.

name: Modern Geometric Rug
description: Contemporary area rug with bold geometric pattern in black, white, and gray. Low-profile design perfect for high-traffic areas with easy-care synthetic fibers.

name: Upholstered Storage Bench
description: Versatile storage bench with button-tufted top in sage green velvet. Perfect for bedroom, entryway, or living room organization with hidden storage compartment.

name: Live Edge End Table
description: Unique live edge end table crafted from reclaimed walnut with natural bark edge. Each piece features one-of-a-kind wood grain patterns and industrial hairpin legs.

name: Crystal Chandelier
description: Elegant 6-light crystal chandelier with chrome finish. Creates stunning light refraction and serves as dramatic focal point for formal dining rooms and entryways.

name: Velvet Throw Pillow Set
description: Set of two luxurious velvet throw pillows in deep burgundy. Adds rich color and sumptuous texture to sofas, chairs, or beds with hidden zipper closures.

name: Upholstered Headboard
description: King-size upholstered headboard in navy blue linen with vertical channel tufting. Wall-mounted design saves floor space while adding elegant backdrop to bed.

name: Black Floating Shelves Set
description: Set of three black floating shelves in graduated sizes. Perfect for displaying books, photos, and decorative objects without visible brackets for clean modern look.

name: Reclaimed Wood Buffet
description: Rustic dining room buffet crafted from reclaimed barnwood with sliding barn doors. Combines ample storage functionality with authentic farmhouse charm and character.

name: Roman Stripe Throw Blanket
description: Soft cotton throw blanket with classic Roman stripe pattern in neutral tones. Perfect for draping over sofas or keeping cozy while reading with breathable cotton construction.

name: Scandinavian Light Gray Sofa
description: Clean-lined three-seat sofa in light gray linen with oak legs. Minimalist Scandinavian design emphasizes comfort and simplicity, perfect for modern living spaces seeking understated elegance.

name: Industrial Metal Dining Chair
description: Sturdy dining chair with powder-coated black metal frame and distressed leather seat. Industrial design perfect for urban lofts and contemporary dining spaces with authentic character.

name: Extendable Cherry Dining Table
description: Beautiful cherry wood dining table that extends from 6 to 8 seats. Rich cherry finish showcases natural wood grain while butterfly leaf mechanism ensures smooth extension for entertaining.

name: Brass Sconce Light
description: Wall-mounted brass sconce with frosted glass shade and swing-arm design. Perfect for reading nooks, bedside lighting, or accent illumination with adjustable positioning.

name: Antique Armoire
description: Large antique-style armoire with carved details and rich mahogany finish. Features hanging space, drawers, and shelves for complete bedroom storage solution.

name: Power Reclining Chair
description: Luxurious power reclining chair in brown leather with USB charging ports and memory foam cushioning. Ultimate comfort technology meets classic design.

name: Botanical Print Set
description: Set of four framed botanical prints featuring vintage-inspired plant illustrations. Green and cream color palette perfect for bringing natural elements indoors.

name: Glass Accent Table
description: Small glass accent table with curved legs and minimalist design. Perfect beside chairs or sofas for drinks, books, or decorative objects without visual weight.

name: Red Chunky Knit Throw
description: Oversized chunky knit throw blanket in warm red wool blend. Cozy texture and vibrant color perfect for adding warmth and visual interest to any seating area.

name: Black Media Console
description: Sleek black media console with sliding doors and cable management. Modern design accommodates large TVs while concealing electronics and media storage.

name: Modern Chandelier
description: Contemporary 8-light chandelier with geometric metal frame in matte black. Linear design creates striking focal point perfect for dining rooms or large entryways.

name: Upholstered Dining Chair
description: Comfortable dining chair with button-tufted back in soft gray fabric and dark wood legs. Classic design provides dining comfort while complementing various table styles.

name: Pink Floral Area Rug
description: Soft area rug with delicate pink and cream floral pattern. Vintage-inspired design adds feminine charm and warmth to bedrooms or living spaces.

name: Oak Full-Length Mirror
description: Full-length mirror with solid oak frame and beveled glass. Perfect for bedrooms or dressing areas, combining functionality with natural wood warmth.

name: Ladder Bookshelf
description: Unique ladder-style bookshelf in white with five graduated shelves. Leaning design saves space while creating interesting visual display for books and objects.

name: Industrial Bar Table
description: High bar table with reclaimed wood top and black metal pipe base. Perfect for casual dining, home bars, or small kitchens with authentic industrial character.

name: Blackout Bedroom Curtains
description: Heavy blackout curtains in deep charcoal that block 100% of light. Thermal insulation helps regulate room temperature while ensuring restful sleep.

name: Wooden Base Table Lamp
description: Rustic table lamp with natural wood base and burlap shade. Warm lighting perfect for cabins, farmhouse decor, or adding natural elements to any room.

name: Storage Counter Stool
description: Counter-height stool with hidden storage compartment in seat and industrial metal frame. Perfect for kitchen islands where extra storage is needed.

name: Gray Faux Fur Pillow
description: Luxurious faux fur throw pillow in soft gray with plush texture. Adds cozy glamour and tactile interest to sofas, chairs, or beds.

name: Gold Metal Wall Art
description: Abstract metal wall sculpture in brushed gold finish with geometric shapes. Modern sculptural piece creates dimensional focal point perfect for contemporary interiors.

name: White Box Spring
description: Standard queen box spring in white fabric covering. Low-profile design provides mattress support while maintaining clean bedroom aesthetic.

name: Multicolor Braided Rug
description: Traditional braided rug in multicolor pattern featuring warm earth tones. Hand-braided construction adds rustic charm to kitchens, family rooms, or entryways.

name: Corner TV Stand
description: Space-saving corner TV stand in dark walnut with two open shelves and cabinet storage. Perfect for maximizing corner space while organizing entertainment equipment.

name: Velvet Accent Chair
description: Elegant accent chair in deep purple velvet with gold legs and button tufting. Luxurious statement piece perfect for adding color and sophistication to any room.

name: Colorful Floor Lamp
description: Modern floor lamp with adjustable colorful shade in turquoise and white geometric pattern. Adds playful color while providing functional task or ambient lighting.

name: Globe End Table
description: Unique spherical end table in white lacquer with hidden storage compartment. Modern sculptural piece functions as side table while adding artistic element.

name: Blue Cable Knit Throw
description: Cozy cable knit throw blanket in ocean blue cotton blend. Traditional knit pattern provides warmth and texture perfect for sofas, chairs, or beds.

name: Hexagonal Mirror Set
description: Set of seven hexagonal mirrors in various sizes creating honeycomb pattern. Modern geometric design perfect for creating custom wall arrangements and reflecting light.

name: Cube Storage Shelves
description: Modular cube storage system in white with nine compartments. Versatile organization solution perfect for books, toys, decorative objects, or storage baskets.

name: Wooden Dining Chair
description: Classic wooden dining chair in natural finish with contoured seat and backrest. Simple design complements various dining tables while providing comfortable seating.

name: Farmhouse Pendant Light
description: Rustic farmhouse pendant with galvanized metal shade and vintage-style Edison bulb. Perfect for kitchen islands or dining areas seeking authentic farmhouse character.

name: Navy and Gold Area Rug
description: Sophisticated area rug with navy background and gold geometric pattern. Contemporary design adds elegance and visual interest to living rooms or dining areas.

name: Landscape Canvas Print
description: Large canvas print featuring serene mountain landscape in muted earth tones. Nature photography brings calming outdoor beauty into interior spaces.

name: Hallway Storage Bench
description: Narrow storage bench perfect for hallways and entryways with lift-top seat and lower shoe storage. Maximizes utility in tight spaces.

name: Live Edge Coffee Table
description: Stunning coffee table with live edge walnut slab top and hairpin legs. Each piece showcases unique wood grain patterns celebrating natural beauty.

name: Vintage Oriental Rug
description: Distressed vintage-style oriental rug in faded blues and creams. Machine-woven construction provides durability while maintaining authentic aged appearance for character-rich interiors.

name: White Shaker Cabinet
description: Classic white shaker-style cabinet with raised panel doors and brushed nickel hardware. Versatile storage solution perfect for kitchens, bathrooms, or utility rooms.

name: Gray Tufted Platform Bed
description: Contemporary platform bed with diamond-tufted headboard in charcoal gray fabric. Low-profile design eliminates need for box spring while creating sophisticated bedroom focal point.

name: Black and White Photography Set
description: Set of three framed black and white landscape photographs in sleek black frames. Professional quality prints create sophisticated gallery wall perfect for modern interiors.

name: Turquoise Velvet Curtains
description: Luxurious velvet curtains in vibrant turquoise with blackout lining. Rod pocket design makes installation easy while rich color adds dramatic flair to any room.

name: Round Storage Ottoman
description: Versatile round ottoman with hidden storage and button-tufted top in cream linen. Perfect as extra seating, footrest, or coffee table while concealing clutter.

name: Mid-Century Walnut Side Table
description: Authentic mid-century modern side table in rich walnut with tapered legs and single drawer. Clean lines and warm wood tone complement vintage and contemporary decor.

name: Tripod Floor Lamp
description: Modern tripod floor lamp with adjustable wooden legs and linen drum shade. Scandinavian-inspired design provides ambient lighting while serving as sculptural accent piece.

name: Black and White Cowhide Rug
description: Genuine cowhide rug in classic black and white pattern. Natural hide provides unique texture and pattern variation, perfect for adding rustic sophistication to modern spaces.

name: Round Brass Mirror
description: Large round mirror with thin brass frame and clean modern lines. Perfect statement piece for entryways or above mantels, reflecting light while adding metallic warmth.

name: Leather Wingback Chair
description: Classic wingback chair in rich cognac leather with brass nail head trim. Traditional silhouette updated with contemporary proportions creates timeless elegance for any room.

name: Oak Wardrobe Armoire
description: Spacious oak wardrobe with hanging rod, shelves, and drawer storage. Traditional craftsmanship meets modern functionality for complete bedroom organization solution.

name: Yellow Lumbar Pillow
description: Bright yellow lumbar pillow in cotton canvas with contrasting navy piping. Perfect accent piece for adding cheerful color and lower back support to sofas and chairs.

name: Industrial Console Table
description: Rugged console table combining reclaimed wood top with black metal pipe legs. Industrial aesthetic perfect for entryways, behind sofas, or as media console.

name: Crystal Table Lamp
description: Elegant crystal base table lamp with white silk shade. Cut crystal creates beautiful light refraction while providing sophisticated illumination for bedside or accent lighting.

name: White Canopy Bed
description: Romantic white canopy bed with four posts and flowing curtain panels. Creates dreamy bedroom sanctuary perfect for master suites seeking fairy-tale elegance.

name: Natural Jute Area Rug
description: Handwoven jute area rug in natural beige with subtle texture variations. Eco-friendly material adds organic warmth and casual sophistication to any room.

name: Floating Corner Shelves
description: Set of three white floating corner shelves in graduated sizes. Space-saving design perfect for displaying books, plants, and decorative objects in unused corner spaces.

name: Industrial Bar Chair
description: Adjustable height bar chair with distressed leather seat and black metal frame. Industrial design perfect for kitchen islands or bar areas with authentic urban appeal.

name: Ceramic Sculpture Set
description: Set of three abstract ceramic sculptures in matte white finish. Modern organic shapes create sophisticated sculptural display perfect for mantels, shelves, or tables.

name: Reclaimed Wood Dining Table
description: Large rectangular dining table crafted from reclaimed barn wood with steel hairpin legs. Rustic character meets modern design for unique entertaining centerpiece.

name: Natural Sheer Curtains
description: Flowing sheer curtains in natural linen blend that filter light beautifully while maintaining privacy. Soft drape and neutral color complement any decor style.

name: Vintage Storage Chest
description: Antique-style storage chest with distressed finish and brass corner hardware. Perfect for blanket storage at foot of bed or as coffee table with hidden storage.

name: Globe Pendant Light
description: Modern glass globe pendant light with brass fittings and adjustable cord length. Clean spherical design provides even light distribution perfect for kitchen islands or dining areas.

name: LED Vanity Mirror
description: Hollywood-style vanity mirror with LED bulbs around perimeter providing perfect makeup lighting. Dimmable lights and sleek white frame create professional beauty station.

name: Oak Entryway Bench
description: Solid oak bench with slatted design and lower storage shelf. Perfect for entryways, mudrooms, or bedroom seating with classic craftsmanship and practical storage.

name: Blue Geometric Throw Pillows
description: Set of two throw pillows featuring bold geometric patterns in navy and white. Contemporary design adds visual interest and comfort to sofas, chairs, or beds.

name: Floating Nightstand
description: Wall-mounted floating nightstand in walnut finish with hidden drawer and open shelf. Space-saving design perfect for small bedrooms or modern minimalist aesthetics.

name: Gray Striped Runner Rug
description: Long runner rug with subtle gray and white stripes perfect for hallways, kitchens, or entryways. Low-profile construction withstands high-traffic areas while adding style.

name: Tan Chesterfield Sofa
description: Classic Chesterfield sofa in rich tan leather with deep button tufting and rolled arms. Traditional British design brings timeless elegance to formal living rooms with authentic leather aging.

name: Oak Writing Desk
description: Compact writing desk in solid oak with single drawer and cable management. Perfect for home offices or bedrooms where space is limited but style matters.

name: Rustic Chain Chandelier
description: Farmhouse chandelier with weathered wood beam and hanging mason jar lights. Rustic design perfect for dining rooms seeking authentic country charm with modern functionality.

name: Red Kilim Area Rug
description: Hand-woven kilim rug in rich red with traditional geometric patterns. Flat-weave construction and authentic designs add global sophistication to any interior space.

name: Sunburst Gold Mirror
description: Dramatic sunburst mirror with radiating gold-finished rays extending from central mirror. Statement piece creates stunning focal point while reflecting light throughout the room.

name: Walnut Armoire
description: Large walnut armoire with multiple compartments, hanging space, and adjustable shelves. Traditional craftsmanship meets modern storage needs for complete bedroom organization.

name: Blue Ikat Throw Pillows
description: Set of two throw pillows featuring traditional ikat pattern in blue and white. Hand-dyed appearance adds global textile artistry to sofas, chairs, or beds.

name: Swivel Bar Stool
description: Adjustable height bar stool with 360-degree swivel and faux leather seat. Modern design with chrome base perfect for kitchen islands or home bars.

name: Globe Nesting Tables
description: Set of three nesting tables with spherical bases in different sizes. Space-saving design allows tables to nest together or separate for flexible occasional seating.

name: Wall Sconce Set
description: Pair of modern wall sconces with matte black finish and brass accents. Perfect for flanking mirrors, artwork, or providing ambient lighting in hallways and bedrooms.

name: Bohemian Multicolor Curtains
description: Flowing curtains with bohemian-inspired patterns in warm earth tones and jewel colors. Eclectic design adds artistic flair and vibrant energy to any room.
